sources.title: Tonight or Never (1931) GLORIA SWANSON â™¥ MELVYN DOUGLAS
sources.description:
UCLA Film & Television RESTORED Edition!
Stars: Gloria Swanson, Melvyn Douglas, Boris Karloff
Director: Mervyn LeRoy
In this Pre-Code Hollywood Romantic Comedy, a Hungarian opera singer finds her career stalled until she discovers romance with a handsome admirer. Will he be the man of her dreams or just a gigolo?

metadata.Plot: A young opera singer finds her career stalled because of her cold and passionless performances, until she finds romance with a handsome admirer.
metadata.Writer: Fanny Hatton, Frederic Hatton, Lily Hatvany
metadata.Actors: Gloria Swanson, Melvyn Douglas, Alison Skipworth
